name: Game of Roads
description:
**** 4/5 - "There's a thoughtful, austere puzzle game waiting at the end of this road." - J. Minor, 148apps.com ****

Settle on tiles, connect them with roads. Build up their values by connecting multiple tiles to your capitals. In Duel mode capture enemy tiles by building strength where its needed.

Tiles are turned in a new order and randomized for each game. Earn achievements and make your way to the top of the world-wide leaderboards!

- 21, 30 and 38 turn Single Player Modes for beating the best of the best
- 2-Player Duel mode for challenging your friend on a single device
